definitions.definition: The lower surface or part of something.
definitions.example: The underneath of the aircraft was painted blue.

definitions.definition: A background radio sound track played during a specific announcement or program.

definitions.example: You can have the underneath bunk.

definitions.definition: On the underside or lower face.

definitions.example: Underneath the water, all was calm.

definitions.definition: Under the control or power of.
definitions.example: There was little freedom underneath the jackboot.
